name: Animaniacs
overview: Yakko, Wakko and Dot are out of the water tower and running wild across the movie sets of "Bungle in the Jungle", "Remember the a la Mode" and "To Scream or not to Scream". Guide their hilarious hijinks to find power-ups and avoid crazy traps like catapults, runaway trains, and giant boulders. Use each character's special abilities and unique talents on your quest to collect the key movie props on each set!
